A technology-focused organisation in Sundsvall is seeking a **Senior .NET Developer** to join their growing engineering team. This role offers the chance to work on modernising core systems, introducing event-driven architecture, and driving technical initiatives alongside an experienced Tech Lead, Principal Architect, and skilled development team.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Lead and contribute to the design and implementation of scalable backend services and APIs.
* Shape system architecture with a strong focus on performance, maintainability, and security.
* Develop event-driven components using technologies such as Kafka or Azure Service Bus.
* Drive improvements across CI/CD pipelines for smooth and reliable deployments.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams (frontend, data, product) to deliver impactful solutions.
* Mentor junior developers and foster a high-quality engineering culture.
* 

**Requirements:**

* 5+ years of hands-on experience in C# / .NET (Core or later).
* Solid understanding of event-driven architectures (CQRS, event sourcing, messaging systems).
* Experience building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, etc.).
* Strong knowledge of cloud platforms, ideally Microsoft Azure.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.
* Frontend development experience with React, TypeScript, or Node.js.
* Exposure to financial services or AI/ML frameworks.
* Advanced experience in Azure PaaS services and cloud-native design
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Fullstack Developer – Gothenburg
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are looking for a skilled Fullstack Developer to join a forward-thinking, people-focused tech team that values collaboration, continuous learning, and work-life balance. You’ll work in a supportive environment that encourages exploration, flexible work schedules, and challenging the status quo.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate within a cross-functional team to drive end-to-end product development.
* Design, build, and maintain modern applications and frameworks.
* Write clean, efficient, and secure code across both front-end and back-end.
* Work closely with teammates to deliver high-quality solutions.
* Share knowledge, learn continuously, and contribute to process and product improvements.
* 

**Requirements:**

* 7+ years of development experience, with proven expertise across both front-end and back-end technologies.
* Strong proficiency in .NET Framework, C#, SQL Server, SQL, TypeScript, JavaScript, PowerShell, Jira, and Azure DevOps.
* Fluent in Swedish and English (spoken and written).
* Nice to Have: Experience with SharePoint (on-premises or cloud).

**What We Offer:**

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance

title: Databasspecialist/Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**

  

* Minst 9 års dokumenterad yrkeserfarenhet av systemutveckling.
* Minst 7 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med Oracle under de senaste 9 åren.
* Minst 4 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av programmering i C++.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta i Linux-miljö, inklusive att skapa, läsa och förstå ksh- och/eller bash-skript.
* Minst 6 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med databaser.
* Minst 9 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med system- eller databasutveckling inom en IT-organisation eller IT-avdelning.
* God kunskap om databaser med mycket stor vana att analysera, konfigurera och underhålla.
* Uttrycka sig väl i tal och skrift på svenska.

  

**Meriterande**  

* Jobbat med PL/SQL mot databaser
* Arbetat med Embedded SQL

  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 07-11-2025 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Fullstack Developer React
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

 **Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Minimum 8 years of experience in software development.
* Strong proficiency in React, TypeScript/JavaScript, and modern state management (e.g., Redux, GraphQL).
* Solid experience with Java and Spring Boot.
* Experience with AWS and cloud-native application deployment.
* Familiarity with test automation frameworks (e.g., Jest, Cypress).
* Excellent communication skills are a must. Swedish skills is a bonus!

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 16-11-2025  


  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Embeddedutvecklare
description:
Brinner du för säkerhetskritiska system? Bli Embeddedutvecklare på ett ledande teknikbolag i Göteborg! ️

**Om företaget:**


Hos vår kund blir du en del av ett dynamiskt team på ett av Nordens största teknikkonsultföretag, där du får möjlighet att arbeta med både nischade och varierande projekt. Din roll kan skräddarsys efter dina styrkor och ambitioner, och du får arbeta med teknik som gör verklig skillnad – företaget verkar globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och bidrar till att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. Som konsult får du också erfarenhet från olika branscher, såsom industri, försvar, medtech, fordon och telekom, vilket ger en bred och stimulerande karriär.


Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

**Om rollen:**


Det här är en bred och viktig roll där du blir spindeln i nätet på kontoret – du utvecklar och implementerar mjukvara för inbyggda system i säkerhetskritiska miljöer. Rollen kan även inkludera försvarsrelaterade projekt, support och problemlösning. Möjlighet finns för rätt person att ta nästa steg som teamledare, produktägare eller Scrum Master.


Du kommer bland annat att:

* Utveckla mjukvara för inbyggda system i säkerhetskritiska miljöer
* Stötta teamet med problemlösning och integration
* Arbeta i team med fokus på samarbete och kunskapsdelning

**Du erbjuds:**

  

* **Spännande och varierande projekt** – Arbeta inom flera branscher och tekniker med fokus på hållbara och säkra lösningar.
* **Skräddarsydd roll** – Din tjänst anpassas efter dina kunskaper, intressen och karriärmål.
* **Karriärutveckling** – Möjlighet att växa inom företaget, exempelvis som teamledare eller specialist.
* **Hållbar arbetsmiljö** – Balans mellan arbete och privatliv med fokus på långsiktig utveckling.
* **Lärande och innovation** – Teknik-kvällar och workshops där du får bygga system och utveckla nya lösningar.
* **Påverkan på kultur och processer** – Var med och forma företagets arbetsmiljö och samarbetsklimat.
* **Teamkänsla i fokus** – Social och relationsbyggande arbetsmiljö med stort fokus på samarbete.
  

**Vi ser gärna att du:**


Som person är du flexibel och anpassningsbar – kanske har du tidigare erfarenhet som konsult eller en naturlig fallenhet för att arbeta i konsultliknande miljöer. Du har ett genuint intresse för att arbeta med säkerhetskritiska system och vill vara med och skapa robusta, högkvalitativa lösningar.

  


Vi ser gärna att du har:

* En relevant kandidatexamen inom datavetenskap, elektronik, mekatronik eller liknande.
* 3,5–5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling för inbyggda system.
* God kunskap i programmering med C och/eller C++.

  

*Det är också meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Linux-miljöer, kunskap om versions- och automationsverktyg som Git, eller om du har en masterexamen eller civilingenjörsexamen.*

  


  

**Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Ebba Strömberg:
* ebba.stromberg@futuriapeople.se


Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!


Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

Din roll kan skräddarsys efter dina styrkor och ambitioner, och du får arbeta med teknik som gör verklig skillnad – företaget verkar globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och bidrar till att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. * En relevant kandidatexamen inom datavetenskap, elektronik, mekatronik eller liknande.
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet i en liknande DevOps-roll.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD, DevOps-verktyg, testautomation samt integrations- och automationskedjor.
* Kunskap eller erfarenhet av något av följande språk och verktyg: JavaScript, Python, Bash, Java, Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes.

title: Senior Front End Developer
description:
Assignment description

**We are looking for a Senior Front End Developer for our client in Stockholm:**




**Assignment description:**

* Our client is changing our external partner used for the execution of orders in external mutual funds. They will establish a new partnership that can execute mutual fund orders in external funds for our customers in Sweden, Norway and Finland. At the same time we are rebuilding the IT solution for the processing of our mutual fund orders in external funds. The current IT solution is running on outdated technology such as old Java versions, SOAP web services and outdated frontend technology. The new IT solutions is to be built on Java 21, Spring Boot microservices and Microsoft SQL databases, with REST APIs and Kafka as integration technologies.
* The frontend technology is React, and we will also implement test automation using JUnit and Cucumber.
* **Qualifications:**


	+ Javascript
	+ React **Start date**: 2026-01-05

**End date**: 2027-01-31

**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden




**Please apply directly through our system with:**


	+ Your updated CV
	+ Information about when you are available to start the assignment
	+ In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education and personal qualities.  

Please note: We do not accept any applications through email. All applications have to be sent through the portal to be valid.




**Offer continuously:**

Please note that for this role we offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Utvecklare inom beredskap till Säkerhetsenheten
description:
Om arbetsplatsen


Nu söker vi två utvecklare som vill vara med och stärka kommunens förmåga inom civil beredskap. Hos oss får du bidra till något större att se till att samhället fungerar, även när det oväntade händer.  

  

På Säkerhetsenheten som är en del av Kommunledningskontoret, arbetar fjorton engagerade kollegor med ett gemensamt mål att göra Eskilstuna till en ännu tryggare och säkrare plats för alla som bor, arbetar och verkar här. Vi leder, samordnar och utvecklar kommunens arbete inom säkerhet och beredskap och har uppdrag som spänner över allt från brottsförebyggande insatser och tryggare offentliga miljöer till säkerhetsskydd, krisberedskap och totalförsvar.  



Arbetsuppgifter


Som utvecklare inom beredskap får du en roll med både ansvar och möjligheter. Du arbetar nära kollegor och verksamheter i hela kommunen för att driva utvecklingen inom säkerhetsskydds- och beredskapsområdet. Du utvecklar kommunens arbete med risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser och kontinuitetsplanering, följer upp aktiviteter och tar fram beslutsunderlag som hjälper kommunen att fatta kloka, långsiktiga beslut.  

  

Du får också leda utredningar och utvecklingsprojekt, bidra med din analytiska förmåga och hjälpa till att forma nya arbetssätt och metoder. Ibland deltar du i kommunens krisledningsarbete när läget kräver snabba och trygga beslut. Det är en varierad och viktig roll där din insats gör verklig skillnad för människor, verksamheter och hela kommunen.  



Kvalifikationer


Vi söker dig som har akademisk examen inom exempelvis statsvetenskap, sociologi eller ett annat relevant område Du uttrycker dig väl på svenska i både tal och skrift, är svensk medborgare och har B-körkort. Det är en stor fördel om du redan har erfarenhet av myndighetsutredningar, risk- och sårbarhetsanalyser, säkerhetsskydd, civil beredskap eller kontinuitetsplanering. Vi ser det också som meriterande om du behärskar ett utomeuropeiskt språk.
  

  

Du är analytisk, strukturerad och har lätt för att se samband mellan detaljer och helhet. Samtidigt är du en lagspelare som trivs med samarbete och som får energi av att bidra till gemensamma mål och att skapa resultat. Du har ett genuint samhällsengagemang och vill vara med och skapa trygghet och beredskap både i vardagen och när det oväntade sker. Välkommen att söka! Tillsammans bygger vi ett robust Eskilstuna där tryggheten står stadigt, oavsett vad som händer.  

Tjänsten är placerad i säkerhetsklass.  

  

  



Anställningens omfattning


Enligt överenskommelse  

Tillsvidare.


Ansökan


Referensnummer: 251911

title: Fullstack Developer - AI-Enhanced Development
description:
Join Mitigram as a Fullstack Developer and help build our next-generation trade platform and AI-assisted products. We're looking for engineers who can hit the ground running in a modern, clean architecture and are eager to embrace AI as an integral part of the development workflow.


If you're excited about the future of development—where AI amplifies your capabilities rather than replaces them — this role is for you.

### **About****Mitigram**


Mitigram is the leading digital platform for global trade financing. It is on a journey to build the largest and most comprehensive trade finance network, leveraging data to enable insights and accelerate the digitalisation of global trade and trade finance.


As a growing company with a collaborative, innovative team, we offer an exciting opportunity to make a tangible impact on cutting-edge projects. Join us as we shape the future of Trade Finance!

### **Why You’ll Love This Role**


We don’t just allow AI tools -we integrate them.  

You’ll collaborate with **AI-powered development agents** like Claude Code that understand our architecture and workflows, enabling you to build faster, cleaner, and smarter.

### **Our Tech Stack**

**Backend**

* .NET 8 with C# 13 (using the latest language features)
* Domain-Driven Design (DDD): aggregate roots, entities, value objects
* CQRS pattern via Mediator
* SQL Server + Dapper (high-performance data access)
* Redis for distributed caching
* xUnit and Test Driven Development

**Frontend**

* Svelte 4, Typescript, Angular
* SASS/CSS and design system integration
* Vite for modern build tooling with HMR
* Testing with Vitest
* Collaboration through Figma

**Infrastructure**

* Azure cloud-native deployment
* Docker + Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration
* JWT/OAuth/SAML for enterprise authentication

### **What You’ll Bring to Succeed**

**Must Have:**

* Comfort using AI coding assistants (Copilot, Claude, etc.)
* Strong C#/.NET background with solid DDD understanding
* Experience with CQRS or similar architectural patterns
* Proficiency in a modern reactive framework - Angular + Typescript (or Svelte experience)
* Strong TypeScript and type-safe coding practices
* SQL expertise—you write queries, not just use ORMs
* TDD mindset—tests are part of how you think
* 5-7 years of professional experience in full-stack development
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field, *or* equivalent demonstrated experience in full-stack software development.

**Nice to Have:**

* Svelte experience (or eagerness to learn fast)
* Dapper or micro-ORM familiarity
* Hands-on experience with Azure cloud services

### **The Mindset We’re Looking For**


**AI-First Thinking** – You treat AI as a collaborator that accelerates your output and quality.  

️ **Architecture Matters** – You care deeply about clean code and maintainable systems.  

**Test-Driven** – You write tests to move faster and deploy confidently.  

**Craft & Quality** – You take pride in both backend elegance and frontend polish.  

**Ownership** – You ship features end-to-end, from database to UI.

### **What You’ll Build**

* Secure enterprise authentication (SSO, MFA, social login)
* User and organisation management features
* Security-critical, auditable systems
* Responsive, accessible frontends
* API integrations across Mitigram’s ecosystem
* Scalable microservices

### **Our Development Culture**

* **API-First Development** – clear contracts and strong types
* **Code Review & Collaboration** – we learn and grow together
* **AI Integration** – specialised agents that understand our patterns
* **Continuous Deployment** – ship fast, ship often

### **About the Team**


You’ll join a team that values technical excellence, clean architecture, and pragmatic engineering. Together, we’re building critical infrastructure for Mitigram’s global trade platform—work that matters, done right.

### **As a Mitizen**

* You will be part of cutting-edge projects in Trade Finance.
* Have the opportunity to collaborate with a curious, open, and innovative team.
* You will enjoy career growth opportunities and professional development support.
* You will benefit from a learning budget, comprehensive health insurance, and a strong focus on work-life balance.
* You will make a tangible impact in a growing, fast-paced company.

### **What happens next?**


If you believe this position aligns with your skills and career goals, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible! We will review applications on a rolling basis.


At Mitigram, we’re open and curious, so if you are not entirely confident you meet our exact criteria, apply anyway —we value many other qualities as well. We're committed to building an inclusive and diverse team. We welcome applications from developers of all backgrounds who share our passion for technical excellence and innovation.

### **Reference and Background Checks**


As part of the recruitment process, we will ask the final candidate for references and conduct a background check.

title: Software Developer
description:
**About InformaIT**
-------------------


Do you want to be a part of a fast-growing SaaS company that innovates proofreading? Then InformaIT is the right place for you.


For the last twenty years, InformaIT has been innovating proofreading to make it foolproof. Although remarkable, the human eye is not always reliable. That’s why we exist: to give the human factor a break while making proofreading much faster and wholly accurate so that our customers can save time while never worrying about flaws in artwork production.


In other words, we are innovative creators of fully GAMP5-validated proofreading software – designed to detect deviations and present them in a printable report. Since Inform Content Compare is 100 percent web-based and free from plugins, you only need a browser. And you know what? Anyone can use our products. On any platform, anytime, anywhere.


Our customers range from the pharmaceutical industry to food and beverages and advertising agencies. Using our Content Compare suite; our customers get professional help, from the early draft stages to the finished print. That is what we like to call accuracy made easy.

**About the role**
------------------


As a software developer at InformaIT you will work across front end and back end on a mature product where your work will speed up delivery and support growth in usage and customers. You will ship improvements that matter, raise reliability and usability, and help prepare the path to a more modern stack. You will have mentoring, pairing, and clear chances to take ownership as you learn.  

  

**Why join now?**  

Customers rely on a proven product today and we are preparing the move toward a modern architecture. Join to learn the system in depth, ship improvements users feel, and grow into the transition as it unfolds.

**What You’ll Do as a Software Developer**
------------------------------------------

* Improve key user journeys and deliver product enhancements end to end.
* Turn customer insights into shipped changes with measurable impact.
* Contribute to refactors, tests, and platform groundwork for the transition.

**What we’re looking for**
--------------------------


We are looking for someone who has:

* Around 3 to 5 years experience of building web applications, backend, frontend, or full stack.
* Ability to read existing code, can reason about trade offs, and make steady improvements.
* A learning mindset is essential, alongside strong fundamentals in C# and a modern JavaScript framework.

  


If you are not sure you meet every point, please apply. We hire for potential and learning.* 

**Why InformaIT**
-----------------


Apart from being part of a fast-growing SaaS company that delivers proven value to its customers, you will join a driven and ambitious team where you can develop both personally and professionally. As we continue our international expansion, you will have the chance to work towards a global market and across different industries.  

  

At InformaIT, we believe in creating an environment where everyone can thrive. We offer:

* Hybrid work with a central Malmö office and flexible hours
* 30 days paid vacation plus learning and well being benefits
* Supportive, international team where ideas and initiative are valued
* Salary range shared early in the process

 *Please submit your application in* ***English*** *since it is our primary corporate language.*

*We look forward to hearing from you!*

title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Ruby
description:
**At Hemnet, we’re not just building Sweden’s leading property platform – we’re shaping how people find their future homes. Now we’re looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer who’s excited about Ruby, service oriented architecture, and making a real impact.**  

  

Last application day November 23rd

#### **The Role**


You’ll join a collaborative, cross-functional product team where you’ll have real influence on how we build our products. As a hands-on developer with a few years of experience, you’ll write great code, help shape our architecture, and contribute to building a modern, adaptable platform for the future.


We’re on a journey of breaking down a monolith into a service oriented architecture, and your experience here will be key. You’ll work hands-on with Ruby and React (while also touching Node.js) and bring ideas that push us forward.

#### **What You’ll Do**


As part of a team responsible for shaping the buyer experience, you will play a key part in helping people on their journey to buying their dream home. In this role, you’ll:

* Contribute to both backend and frontend development (Ruby, Node.js, React)
* Help shape our architecture as we move towards a service oriented architecture
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and fellow engineers
* Share knowledge and inspire the team
* Bring your personality and perspective to make the team stronger and more diverse
  

#### **Who You Are**


We believe you are experienced in working with Ruby, but also that you are open to learning Node.js. You enjoy guiding, coaching, and sparking great discussions as well as value collaboration, diversity, and creating smart solutions together.
  

We also value if:

* You have experience as a Fullstack Developer
* You have experience in React
* You’ve worked with large-scale applications and know the challenges of breaking down a monolith into a service oriented architecture
  

**I am your new manager**

Hi!  

My name is Caroline Lindfors, I’ve been with Hemnet for a year, and before that I worked in several tech companies in various leadership roles – and earlier in my career as a developer. As a manager, I strive to be supportive, approachable, and humble.


Building trust and helping others grow are things I truly value. I love seeing how the products and features we develop create real value for our users.


Above all, I believe that achieving great results goes hand in hand with having fun at work.

 **A Note on Inclusion**

At Hemnet, we believe that diversity in gender, sexual orientation, ability, neurodiversity, cultural background and life experience makes us stronger. We welcome applicants of all identities and backgrounds.


If you meet many but not all of the requirements, we encourage you to apply. We value curiosity, a strong sense of purpose and the motivation to learn and grow, alongside your skills and experiences.

 **Your career at Hemnet**  

With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.


Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.


With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.  

  

Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.

 **A Hybrid Way of Working**
  

Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.
company_description: At Hemnet we help people find their dream homes.

title: Senior Java developer
description:
**Assignment description**


Professional Galaxy is looking for a Senior Java developer – Back-end, for our client in Stockholm.


Our client is changing our external partner for the execution of orders in external mutual funds. They will establish a new partnership that can execute mutual funds orders in external funds for our customers in Sweden, Norway and Finland. At the same time, they are rebuilding the IT solution for the processing of our mutual fund orders in external funds. The current IT solution is running on outdated technology such as old Java versions, SOAP web-services and outdated front-end technology. The new IT solution is to be built on Java 21, Spring Boot microservices and Microsoft SQL databases, with REST APIs and Kafka as integration technologies. The front-end technology is React, and we will also implement test automation using JUnit and Cucumber.


**Qualifications:**


Java 21, Spring Boot, MS SQL, Kafka, Test automation using J-Unit and Cucumber


**Nice to have:**


Finance in general


Having worked with Cross border Cash payment


**Duration:** 2026.01.05 – 2027.01.31


**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden


**Please apply directly through our system with:**


* Your updated CV
* Availability to start the assignment

In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education and personal qualities.


**Please note:** We do not accept any applications through email. All applications have to be sent through the portal to be valid.


**Offer continuously**: Please note that for this role we offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.


**Required skills**


J-Unit, Test Automation, Java 21, Cucumber, Spring Boot, Kafka, MSSQL, Preferred skills, Cross border Cash payment, Finance

title: Dynamics 365 Developer / Technical Architect (Finance & Operations)
description:
#### **Dynamics 365 Developer / Technical Architect (Finance & Operations)**

**Location:** Remote within EU

**Contract:** Full-Time

#### 

**Join the Future of Digital Tech with Kolomolo**


At **Kolomolo**, we don’t just follow trends - we set them. As a global supplier of IT services and digital modernization solutions, we help businesses embrace cutting-edge technology to optimize their operations. Now, we are growing and looking for fresh talent to grow with us.

*Are you proactive, tech-savvy, and eager to build your career in IT?* ***This role could be your perfect fit.***

#### **About the Role**


We are looking for an experienced **Dynamics 365 Developer or Technical Architect** specializing in **Finance & Operations (F&O)** to join our client’s growing ERP team. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and optimizing D365 solutions focused on Finance and Supply Chain Management modules.


This is a hands-on technical role that offers autonomy, remote flexibility, and the opportunity to contribute to a large-scale digital transformation project.

##### **What You’ll Be Doing**

* Design, develop, and maintain Dynamics 365 F&O solutions using **X++**, data entities, and system integrations.


* Collaborate with functional consultants and business stakeholders to translate requirements into technical specifications.


* Customize and extend Finance and Supply Chain modules to meet business needs.


* Integrate D365 F&O with external systems using APIs, Azure Services, and other integration tools.


* Conduct code reviews, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high-quality technical deliverables.


* Contribute to architecture discussions and technical documentation.

##### **What We Are Looking For**

* **3+ years** of experience in **Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (or AX)** development or architecture.


* Proven expertise in **X++** programming and system **integrations**.


* Strong understanding of **Finance and Supply Chain** business processes.


* Experience working in **remote, cross-functional teams**.


* Fluency in **Swedish and English** (both written and spoken).


* EU-based and able to work **CET hours**.

  

**What is in It for You**


* Competitive salary and benefits.


* Career development opportunities in a growing tech company.


* Continuous learning culture: mentorship, internal training, and certifications.


* Flexible, agile work environment (remote, hybrid, or on-site in Kraków.


* Office perks: great coffee, tea, fresh fruit, snacks, and a fun atmosphere.


* Flat management structure, where your voice matters.


* Regular team events and a social, supportive work culture.

  


#### 

##### **Why Join Kolomolo?**


At **Kolomolo**, we prioritize innovation, agility, and autonomy. Our teams have the freedom to own their work, share ideas, and make meaningful contributions. Inspired by **Scandinavian values**, we believe in **work-life harmony** and creating an inclusive culture where everyone thrives.


You will be part of a passionate, skilled, and friendly team that works hard and celebrates together. Here, you can build your career on your own terms, with opportunities to grow, learn, and make a real impact.

##### **Our Flat Structure & The Culture of Inclusion**


At Kolomolo, we break the corporate mold. We offer:

* **Agile Teams & Autonomy**: No micromanagement. You’ll own your projects and enjoy the freedom to innovate.
* **Work-Life Harmony**: Inspired by Scandinavian values, we prioritize balance and flexibility, where remote work and asynchronous collaboration are in our DNA.
* **Learning & Growth**: Continuous learning is at our core. We reward hard work, value smart ideas, and foster an environment of mutual respect and trust.
* **Inclusive Culture**: We believe in DEI: diversity, equity and inclusion. We are committed to creating an environment where every individual, regardless of background, identity, or experience feels valued, respected, and empowered to thrive.


Join Kolomolo and elevate your career with cutting-edge technology, a supportive team, and a company that truly values your input.


Ready for the next step? **Apply now** and start an exciting journey of growth and innovation with us!

title: Erfaren Java-utvecklare
description:
*Vi på Softhouse söker nu flera erfarna Java-utvecklare för en större leverans åt en kund inom offentlig sektor. Har du flera års erfarenhet av Java och är van att arbeta agilt? Då vill vi lära känna dig!*

**Passar du i rollen?**  

Vi söker dig som är en förtroendeingivande relationsskapare med både kunder och kollegor. I din roll som konsult kan du ta dig an varierande roller, eller ledarhatten i projekt om så behövs, och du har alltid drivet att erbjuda bästa möjliga lösning. Du är lyhörd för kundens behov och delar kontinuerligt med dig av idéer och förbättringsförslag. Utöver detta ser vi gärna att du:

* Har minst 5 års professionell erfarenhet av Java-utveckling.
* Är van att arbeta efter agila arbetssätt och metoder.
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta ur ett livscykelperspektiv med t.ex. kravställning, arkitektur, design, test och integration.
* Har kunskaper av olika verktyg som t.ex. Git, Jira, Jenkins, Maven, CI/CD etc.
* Kan arbeta noggrannt och systematiskt, och har ett högt säkerhetsmedvetande.
* Kan uttrycka dig obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


Det är även meriterande om du har arbetat med:

* Någon av de stora molnplattformarna som AWS, Azure, eller GCP.
* Verktyg/tekniker som JavaScript, Vue.js, Git, OpenShift, Docker och Kubernetes.

  

**What's in it for you?**


På Softhouse blir du en del av ett framåtsträvande bolag med korta beslutsvägar och högt i tak. Vi erbjuder bland annat:

* En mix av kunduppdrag och leveransmodeller där du utmanas tekniskt tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor.
* Möjligheten att bidra med teknisk expertis vid pre-sales och införsäljning med potentiella kunder.
* Individuellt anpassad kompetensutveckling och aktiv kunskapsdelning med Softhouse-kollegor, både lokalt och över kontoren.
* En öppen, prestigelös företagskultur. Vi hittar på allt från aw’s, torsdagsquiz, innebandy- och löpträning och andra hälsofrämjande aktiviteter.
* Ett värderingsstyrt bolag där vi alla känner igen oss i våra värdeord: *Team, Enkelhet, Mod och Passion*

  

**Lite mer om oss!**  

På Softhouse är vi ca 300 medarbetare fördelade på 10 kontor. I Malmö hittar du oss i Slagthuset, ett stenkast från centralstationen, där vi är runt 50 kollegor. Här hittar du ett gäng engagerade kollegor med expertis inom mjukvaruutveckling, AI/ML, design, affärsutveckling och ledarskap. Vi har kodat mjukvara sedan 1996, och arbetar tillsammans varje dag för att skapa lösningar som motsvarar våra kunders behov och överträffar deras förväntningar.

 *Låter det intressant? Då ser vi fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!* *I enlighet med kundens riktlinjer kommer en säkerhetsprövning att genomföras av kund i denna process. Arbete on-site från kundens kontor i södra Skåne kan förekomma ungefär tre dagar per vecka.*

title: Senior Java developer NW X-Box
description:

**Assignment Description:**

The consultant will be responsible for developing and enhancing our Java-based applications that handle taxation, account management, and investment processing for our pension and savings products.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain Java applications supporting our savings and investments products
* Build robust calculation engines that ensure compliance with current tax regulations across multiple countries
* Develop support for complex business processes, integrating with tax authorities, and generating customer facing reports.
* Participate in the full software development lifecycle including requirements analysis, design, coding, testing, and deployment

Please submit your CV as soon as possible since we will review the applications on an on-going basis.


For more information about this role, please contact Kanika Singhal, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Business Developer – Oskarshamn
description:
Vill du vara med och modernisera IT-landskapet hos ett av Sveriges ledande industriföretag?


Vi söker nu en **erfaren Business Analyst / Business Developer** till vår kund i Oskarshamn – en nyckelroll i arbetet med att utveckla och implementera centrala system och processer.

### **Om rollen**


I rollen som **Business Analyst / Business Developer** kommer du att vara en viktig del av teamet som driver implementeringen av kundens centrala IT-system och digitala lösningar.  

Du fungerar som länken mellan verksamhet och teknik – med ansvar för att översätta verksamhetsbehov till tekniska krav och driva förbättringsarbete i nära samarbete med projektledare och andra intressenter.


Du kommer bland annat att:


Stödja och samarbeta med projektledare i pågående utvecklingsinitiativ


Analysera verksamhetsbehov och omvandla dem till tekniska lösningar


Fungera som kontaktperson mellan verksamhet, IT och projektorganisationen


Bidra till modernisering och effektivisering av IT-landskapet


Använda verktyg som **Sparx EA** och gärna **Aris** för processmodellering


### **Din profil**


Vi söker dig som har:


Flera års erfarenhet som **Business Analyst** eller **Business Developer**


God förståelse för både affärsprocesser och tekniska miljöer


Erfarenhet av **Sparx EA** (krav) och gärna **Aris**


Erfarenhet från **projektledning** eller nära samarbete med projektledare


Mycket goda kunskaper i **svenska och engelska**, både i tal och skrift


Du är kommunikativ, analytisk och har lätt för att skapa struktur och tydlighet i komplexa miljöer. Rollen kräver förmågan att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt och driva förbättringsarbete med både teknisk och verksamhetsmässig förståelse.

### **Praktisk information**


**Plats:** Oskarshamn  

**Omfattning:** Heltid (100 %)  

️ **Start:** Omgående  

**Uppdragsperiod:** 10 november 2025 – 31 december 2026  

**Språk:** Svenska och engelska  

**Distansarbete:** Delvis möjligt efter introduktion  

️ **Sista ansökningsdag:** 7 november 2025


Sway Sourcing är en innovativ rekryteringspartner som specialiserar sig på att matcha rätt talang med rätt företag – snabbt och effektivt. Vårt huvudfokus ligger inom Ekonomi, Administration, HR, Marknad och IT, men vi har även den breda expertis och flexibilitet som krävs för att leverera skräddarsydda rekryteringslösningar inom alla branscher.


Trots att vi är en relativt ny aktör har vi redan byggt förtroende hos många av Sveriges största företag och arbetar både nationellt och internationellt. Med baser i Sverige och Spanien erbjuder vi en unik kombination av lokal expertis och global räckvidd. Vårt starka nätverk och djupa branschinsikter gör oss till en självklar partner för företag som vill ligga steget före i sin rekrytering.

title: Senior .NET utvecklare till Knowit i Linköping
description:
**Om rollen**

Hos Knowit i Linköping söker vi en senior .NET-utvecklare som vill mer än att bara skriva bra kod. Du vill leda tekniskt, ta ansvar för helheten och utveckla både lösningar och människor omkring dig.


I rollen får du ta lead i utvecklingsprojekt där vi bygger moderna system åt kunder inom både offentlig och privat sektor. Du är med från arkitektur och teknikval till implementation och coachning av kollegor. Våra uppdrag är varierade och ger dig möjlighet att fokusera på det du brinner för.


Vi arbetar i tvärfunktionella team med hög kompetens och mycket frihet. Du behöver inte kunna allt men bör vara trygg i din roll och van vid att arbeta i komplexa miljöer där samarbete, kommunikation och nyfikenhet är avgörande.

**Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av:**

  

* .NET-utveckling
* REST-API:er & mikrotjänster
* CI/CD-pipelines
* Molnplattformar: AWS, Azure eller GCP
* Är van att arbeta med SQL Server

**Det här får du hos oss**  

En arbetsplats där du har stor frihet att påverka både din egen vardag och våra tekniska lösningar. Här får du arbeta med kompetenta och hjälpsamma kollegor i en kultur som präglas av gemenskap, utveckling och balans. Vi uppmuntrar hybridarbete men gillar att ses i våra fina lokaler i centrala Linköping.


Kompetensutveckling är en självklarhet genom uppdrag, interna forum, vidareutbildning och konferenser.

**Om Knowit Linköping**


Vi är ett växande team på cirka 100 personer inom systemutveckling, BI, cybersäkerhet, embedded och UX. Som en del av Knowit-koncernen har vi över 4 000 kollegor i Norden men här i Linköping är det den lokala känslan och gemenskapen som står i centrum.


Vi är övertygade om att AI inte bara förändrar hur vi löser tekniska problem, utan också hur vi samarbetar, kommunicerar och skapar värde. Därför söker vi dig som redan har testat, eller vill utforska, hur AI kan bidra till smartare arbetssätt och bättre resultat – både för oss själva och våra kunder.

**Redo att ta nästa kliv? Välkommen med din ansökan!**

title: Frontend Developer
description:
Our client is a high-growth start-up operating in the AI-powered legal and compliance technology space, seeking a talented and passionate Frontend Engineer to join their team.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to influence the user experience of a product with global reach and significant ambition, while working in a dynamic environment where your work will directly shape the product’s evolution.
   

  

**About The Role**
* Develop and maintain user-facing features for a sophisticated AI-driven legal & compliance platform.
* Collaborate closely with the Design Lead to translate UI/UX designs into high-quality, responsive code.
* Work hand-in-hand with backend engineers to integrate APIs and build cohesive user flows.
* Build scalable frontend components, optimise performance and responsiveness, and troubleshoot any frontend issues to ensure a reliable product experience.


**Ideal Candidate**
* Has strong proficiency in HTML, CSS and modern TypeScript.
* Has experience working with a contemporary JavaScript framework such as React, Vue or Angular.
* Possesses a sharp eye for detail when it comes to crafting responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
* Is passionate about building top-tier user experiences and comfortable operating with independence in a fast-paced start-up environment.
* Bonus points if you’ve worked with data visualisation or complex interfaces (though this is not mandatory).


 Why This Role?
   

  

* Impact: Join early and have a substantial influence on the UX of a product that tackles complex legal/compliance workflows through AI.
* Innovation: Work at the intersection of AI and legal tech, where design and frontend engineering are core to the product’s success.
* Growth Environment: A start-up culture where your voice is heard, your work is visible and you’re encouraged to take ownership.
* Location: Be part of a team based in Stockholm — a vibrant tech hub, offering lifestyle, culture and great talent networks.

description:

title: Backend Developer Intern   [Remote]
description:
**About XR Solutions** 




 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Backend Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in
 **API development, system integration, and backend architecture** 
 .
 



 This is a
 **remote, hands-on role** 
 where you will work closely with experienced developers to design, implement, and maintain backend services that support our AR platforms.
 



 While this is initially
 **unpaid** 
 , exceptional performance may lead to a
 **paid position** 
 after the internship.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 



* **Develop APIs** 
 : Build and maintain high-performance REST APIs using
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js** 
 .
* **Database Management** 
 : Work with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 and ORM tools (Sequelize) to design and optimize database schemas.
* **System Integrations** 
 : Assist in integrating backend services with AR platforms and machine learning pipelines.
* **Testing & Quality Assurance** 
 : Write and run
 **unit and integration tests** 
 to ensure stability and performance.
* **DevOps Support** 
 : Learn to work with
 **AWS cloud infrastructure** 
 and contribute to maintaining scalable, secure environments.
* **Troubleshooting & Maintenance** 
 : Help debug, patch, and optimize backend systems to improve reliability.
* **Code Reviews** 
 : Participate in peer reviews to maintain code quality and follow industry best practices.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* Proficiency in
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Express.js**
* Solid
 **JavaScript** 
 &
 **TypeScript** 
 skills
* Experience with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 (basic to intermediate)
* Familiarity with
 **AWS services** 
 (some training provided)
* Understanding of
 **Git** 
 (we use Bitbucket)
* Basic knowledge of
 **CI/CD pipelines**
* Awareness of
 **IT security fundamentals**
* (Bonus) Experience with
 **Sequelize ORM**



  





**What You’ll Gain:** 



* Hands-on experience building backend systems for
 **real-world AR applications**
* Exposure to
 **AWS-based scalable architectures**
* Experience with
 **industrial-grade API design, testing, and security**

 **live product launch**

title: Javascript Fullstack Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Udemig is both a Job Guaranteed Software Academy and a dynamic Software Company. We are committed to providing quality education and career opportunities, helping individuals elevate their skills and succeed in the software industry. At Udemig, our expertise lies in fostering innovation and building software solutions that make a real-world impact. Join us to be part of an organization that values growth, learning, and technological excellence.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full-time hybrid role for a JavaScript Fullstack Developer based in Stockholm, with flexibility for some work-from-home. The role involves developing and maintaining scalable web applications, handling both front-end and back-end responsibilities. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, design user-friendly interfaces, implement server-side logic, and ensure code quality to deliver seamless user experiences. The role also includes troubleshooting, optimizing performance, and keeping up-to-date with emerging technologies.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in JavaScript for Front-End Development and expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly designs using Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
* Experience in Back-End Web Development, including server-side logic and database management.
* Comprehensive understanding of Software Development and Full-Stack Development methodologies and practices.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
* Familiarity with modern web development frameworks and tools is a plus.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills with an ability to thrive in a collaborative environment.

title: Fullstack Developer - AI-Enhanced Development
description:
Join Mitigram as a Fullstack Developer and help build our next-generation trade platform and AI-assisted products. We're looking for engineers who can hit the ground running in a modern, clean architecture and are eager to embrace AI as an integral part of the development workflow.
   

  

 If you're excited about the future of development—where AI amplifies your capabilities rather than replaces them — this role is for you.
   

  

**About Mitigram**
 Mitigram is the leading digital platform for global trade financing. It is on a journey to build the largest and most comprehensive trade finance network, leveraging data to enable insights and accelerate the digitalisation of global trade and trade finance.
   

  

 As a growing company with a collaborative, innovative team, we offer an exciting opportunity to make a tangible impact on cutting-edge projects. Join us as we shape the future of Trade Finance!
   

  

**Why You’ll Love This Role**
 We don’t just allow AI tools -we integrate them.
   

  

 You’ll collaborate with
 **AI-powered development agents** 
 like Claude Code that understand our architecture and workflows, enabling you to build faster, cleaner, and smarter.
   

  

**Our Tech Stack**
**Backend**
* .NET 8 with C# 13 (using the latest language features)
* Domain-Driven Design (DDD): aggregate roots, entities, value objects
* CQRS pattern via Mediator
* SQL Server + Dapper (high-performance data access)
* Redis for distributed caching
* xUnit and Test Driven Development


**Frontend**
* Svelte 4, Typescript, Angular
* SASS/CSS and design system integration
* Vite for modern build tooling with HMR
* Testing with Vitest
* Collaboration through Figma


**Infrastructure**
* Azure cloud-native deployment
* Docker + Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration
* JWT/OAuth/SAML for enterprise authentication


**What You’ll Bring To Succeed**
**Must Have:**
* Comfort using AI coding assistants (Copilot, Claude, etc.)
* Strong C#/.NET background with solid DDD understanding
* Experience with CQRS or similar architectural patterns
* Proficiency in a modern reactive framework - Angular + Typescript (or Svelte experience)
* Strong TypeScript and type-safe coding practices
* SQL expertise—you write queries, not just use ORMs
* TDD mindset—tests are part of how you think
* 5-7 years of professional experience in full-stack development
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field, or equivalent demonstrated experience in full-stack software development.


**Nice to Have:**
* Svelte experience (or eagerness to learn fast)
* Dapper or micro-ORM familiarity
* Hands-on experience with Azure cloud services


**The Mindset We’re Looking For**
 🤖
 **AI-First Thinking** 
 – You treat AI as a collaborator that accelerates your output and quality.
   

  

 🏗️
 **Architecture Matters** 
 – You care deeply about clean code and maintainable systems.
   

  

 🧪
 **Test-Driven** 
 – You write tests to move faster and deploy confidently.
   

  

 🎨
 **Craft & Quality** 
 – You take pride in both backend elegance and frontend polish.
   

  

 🚀
 **Ownership** 
 – You ship features end-to-end, from database to UI.
   

  

**What You’ll Build**
* Secure enterprise authentication (SSO, MFA, social login)
* User and organisation management features
* Security-critical, auditable systems
* Responsive, accessible frontends
* API integrations across Mitigram’s ecosystem
* Scalable microservices


**Our Development Culture**
* API-First Development – clear contracts and strong types
* Code Review & Collaboration – we learn and grow together
* AI Integration – specialised agents that understand our patterns
* Continuous Deployment – ship fast, ship often


**About The Team**
 You’ll join a team that values technical excellence, clean architecture, and pragmatic engineering. Together, we’re building critical infrastructure for Mitigram’s global trade platform—work that matters, done right.
   

  

**As a Mitizen**
* You will be part of cutting-edge projects in Trade Finance.
* Have the opportunity to collaborate with a curious, open, and innovative team.
* You will enjoy career growth opportunities and professional development support.
* You will benefit from a learning budget, comprehensive health insurance, and a strong focus on work-life balance.
* You will make a tangible impact in a growing, fast-paced company.


**What happens next?**
 If you believe this position aligns with your skills and career goals, we encourage you to apply as soon as possible! We will review applications on a rolling basis.
   

  

 At Mitigram, we’re open and curious, so if you are not entirely confident you meet our exact criteria, apply anyway —we value many other qualities as well. We're committed to building an inclusive and diverse team. We welcome applications from developers of all backgrounds who share our passion for technical excellence and innovation.
   

  

**Reference and Background Checks**
 As part of the recruitment process, we will ask the final candidate for references and conduct a background check.

title: Software Engineer
description:

 Design, develop, and implement engaging, high-performing Qlik Sense applications, dashboards, and visualizations that address business intelligence needs in Sweden.

title: Full-Stack developer to Pricing & Collateral Tech Team in Financing | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is on an exciting journey to become the most data-driven bank in the world. Are you ambitious, driven, creative, and curious? Do you want to continually grow your skills while working with modern technologies in a cloud-native environment? Then this is your opportunity to join SEB’s Pricing & Collateral team as a Full-Stack Developer.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll help shape how pricing is done in banking by developing and maintaining the pricing platform for SEB’s financing products, serving both private and corporate customers. You’ll also take ownership of the Collateral system, a newly developed solution in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) that manages all collateral data across the bank.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Full-Stack Developer, you’ll be part of a technical team responsible for building and evolving the Pricing platform, a key tool used by pricing managers and integrated with several systems across SEB. You’ll work closely with business stakeholders to gather requirements and propose solutions that leverage modern technologies.
   

  

 In addition to the Pricing platform, you’ll also be working on the Collateral system, a strategic solution in GCP designed to handle all collateral data for the bank. This system plays a critical role in risk management and financial decision-making.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Designing, developing, and maintaining backend and frontend components
* Building APIs and microservices to support pricing and collateral workflows
* Collaborating with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions
* Ensuring high code quality through testing, CI/CD, and best practices


**Required Skills**
* Strong programming skills in C#
* Experience in both frontend and backend development
* Database knowledge (e.g. PostgreSQL, BigQuery)
* API development experience
* Proficiency in Angular
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g. GitLab)
* Strong collaboration skills and a high sense of responsibility
* Interest in understanding business processes and needs


**Desirable (but Not Mandatory)**
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* CI/CD tools and infrastructure as code (e.g. Terraform)
* Knowledge of SOLID principles, Microservices, and REST APIs


**Your profile**
 We believe you have a solid developer background and combine that with a passion for learning and exploring new technologies. You’re experienced in C# .NET and web development, particularly with Angular (or similar frameworks like React). You enjoy solving engineering problems and finding creative solutions to complex challenges.
   

  

 You’re curious about the Swedish banking system and would find it positively challenging to work with two different systems. You’re interested in how pricing and interest rates are set, and how collaterals are used in banking. If you’re passionate about combining technology and business to build impactful solutions, then this is the place for you!
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
 Please attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to SEB and the Pricing Tech team. We review applications on an ongoing basis, so feel free to apply today but no later than 2025-11-20.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact Anton Hänni (Talent Acquisition Partner) at anton.hanni@seb.se. However we do not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.**
 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Software Engineer with QA focus
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 As a Software Engineer with a QA focus, you will be part of a cross-functional development team. In this role, you will design, implement and maintain important e-health solutions - from integrations with national services and specialist systems to medical devices and key healthcare workflows. You will work with products such as integration with national population registries, enabling electronic referrals between healthcare providers, as well as solutions in obstetrics and patient monitoring.
   

  

 Your primary responsibility is to ensure the software quality through test automation, scripting, and active involvement in the entire development lifecycle. You will write and maintain test automation, facilitate test frameworks and perform manual testing where needed – always in close collaboration with other developers, business analysts and product owners.
   

  

 Your tasks will include
   

  

* Design, implement and maintain automated tests and test frameworks
* Participate in code reviews and actively work with the team to ensure high quality in releases
* Identify and handle defects, as well as verify fixes
* Work with continuous improvements in QA practices and tooling, including improving reliability and performance of the solutions
* Involve in design and requirement phase to ensure testability


**We offer**
 This role offers a unique opportunity to work with meaningful products that directly impact patient care and healthcare professionals’ daily work. You’ll be involved in everything from early requirements analysis to deployment, always with a strong focus on quality and continuous improvement.
   

  

**About You**
 You have at least a couple of years of experience working in software development with a focus on quality assurance. You’re comfortable writing code and scripts to support testing activities and have hands-on experience with test automation tools and frameworks.
   

  

 You enjoy working in agile teams and thrive in environments where collaboration and knowledge sharing are key. You have experience testing APIs using tools like Postman or SoapUI, and you understand the importance of testing early and often.
   

  

 Fluency in spoken and written English is required.
   

  

 We believe you are curious, proactive, and passionate about delivering high-quality software. You’re not afraid to challenge assumptions, and you take pride in making things better—whether it’s through automation, smarter processes, or simply asking the right questions.
   

  

 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Till HiQ söker vi nu erfarna Fullstack-utvecklare som vill vara med och skapa innovativa och användarvänliga lösningar för våra kunder. I rollen kommer du fokusera på backend-utveckling och bidra till projekt som gör skillnad för samhället. Du blir en viktig del av ett kompetent team där ni tillsammans hanterar utvecklingen av framtidens digitala tjänster.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som Fullstack-utvecklare kommer du främst att arbeta med backend-utveckling, men även ha möjlighet att bidra med frontend-kompetens när det behövs. Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Backend: Java (Spring, Spring Boot) eller .NET/C#
* Frontend: Javascript/Typescript (React.js, Vue.js eller Angular)
* Molnlösningar: AWS, GCP eller Azure


 Du kommer att delta i hela utvecklingsprocessen från design och utveckling till test och driftsättning, samt bidra med tekniskt innovativa lösningar.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling
* Ingenjörsexamen i datateknik, teknisk fysik, elektroteknik eller motsvarande
* Svenskt medborgarskap och är flytande i svenska och engelska


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes och CI/CD-pipelines
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar (AWS, Azure, GCP)


**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Utmanande uppdrag både ute i våra kunders organisationer samt i vår egen regi, där HiQ har helhetsansvar för projekten.
* Möjlighet att delta i och leda utvecklingen av våra kunders framtida tjänster som förenklar människors vardag
* Kunniga kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sina kunskaper och erfarenheter
* En kreativ arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att utvecklas som människa, kollega och bli bättre på det du redan är bäst på!
* Du blir en del av ett värderingsstyrt bolag som värdesätter glädje och gemenskap och hittar på mycket roligt tillsammans.


**Varför HiQ**
 Sedan 1995 har HiQ varit konsultbolaget som förenklat världen för både kunder och slutanvändare med hjälp av teknik, design och kommunikation. HiQ har alltid fokuserat på två saker: att ha kul på jobbet och att leverera lösningar utöver förväntningar - det är vad som driver oss framåt! Vi HiQare är stolta över att ha en kultur som präglas av
 **resultat** 
 ,
 **ansvar, enkelhet** 
 och
 **glädje** 
 . Vi tror på att arbeta tillsammans för att nå våra gemensamma mål och strävar efter att hjälpa varandra att fortsätta växa och utvecklas. Hos oss får du utöver chansen att utveckla din egen kompetens också möjlighet att lära, leda och inspirera dina kollegor.
   

  

*I denna rekrytering tillämpar vi löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden har gått ut. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå urvalsfrågor, intervjuer, tekniska tester, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!*
