title: Senior Analytics Engineer
description:
**About Us**
============

  

Legora is on a mission: to redefine how legal work gets done. From the very start we have been very clear about the fact that we are not building a solution for lawyers, we are building it with them, because it is the only way to make sure it gets done the right way; working side-by-side every step of the way.


Our AI-native workspace empowers legal professionals not just to work faster - but to ask better questions, unlock new insights. Every day, we push the boundaries of legal tech to make complex processes smarter, faster, and more human. From thousands of documents analysed in minutes to intelligent workflows designed in collaboration with leading practices, we’re turning possibility into reality.


Today we are trusted by global firms like Cleary Gottlieb, Goodwin, Bird & Bird and Linklaters in over 40 countries, but we have no plans on stopping here. We ship fast, we iterate effectively, and we scale rapidly - not by accident, but by design.


When you join Legora, you become part of a team that believes "good enough" isn’t good enough and that the way to win is together, by empowering lawyers to do their best work with technology that truly understands them. If you’re excited by building from first principles, working with exceptional people, and accelerating change in a high-stakes, high-impact domain—then this is the moment and the place.

**We’re not just shaping the future of legal tech — we’re defining it. Ready to join us in building the intelligent future of law?**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 **What you will be doing:**

* Design, build, and maintain scalable, reliable data pipelines and data infrastructure.
* Develop and optimize our data warehouse and intuitive, well-documented data models to support analytics, reporting, self-service, and AI-driven initiatives.
* Ensure data quality, consistency, and reliability through validation, monitoring, and testing tools.
* Work cross-functionally with stakeholders from Product, RevOps, GTM, Finance, and other teams to define key metrics and deliver actionable insights.
* Build and maintain dashboards and automated reporting systems.
* Identify patterns, trends, and opportunities through exploratory analysis and deep dives across the organization.

**Who you are**

* Solid experience in a data engineering, analytics engineering, or similar technical analytics role.
* Experience with SQL, dbt, Python, modern BI tools, and hands-on experience with Snowflake (or similar cloud data warehouses).
* Deep understanding of data modeling, ELT best practices, and building systems that are reliable and scalable.
* A collaborative, curious mindset with the confidence to work independently and challenge assumptions
* Excited to partner directly with business stakeholders and drive decisions through data.
* But most importantly, you are someone who


	+ “Gets stuff done” and understands building a $10bn company isn’t always glamorous and takes hard work and long hours
	+ Strives in a fast-paced environment where the answers aren’t always clear and processes are few

**Legora is an Equal Opportunity Employer**


At Legora, we believe great teams are built on diversity of thought and experience. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and committed to creating an inclusive, high-performance culture where everyone can do their best work. We welcome people of all backgrounds and don’t discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Product and Solutions Specialist - Sweden
description:
At Dell Technologies, we create the extraordinary. Our **Product and Solutions Specialist** are the experts who sell innovation to the world. Responsible for selling business outcomes and positioning our entire infrastructure portfolio (ISG) of products and services. They are expected to be both sales ‘hunters’ and ‘farmers’ with mature sales experience and solid sales processes (eg MEDDIC, deal reviews, QBRs). Ideally an existing set of customer relationships either in private or public sectors demonstrating their ability to build long term relationships with both partners and end customers at a senior level (eg CIO, Head of Infrastructure). Experience of selling AI / Data Management, Private / Public Cloud, and Cyber solutions would be a distinct advantage especially with deep knowledge of the storage (HCI, Block, File, Cyber) and server (GPU & nonGPU) infrastructure market. We are working across multiple verticals and with some of the largest companies building large scale AI end to end infrastructure solutions so we are seeking a high energy and outcome based seller who can open doors into acquisition accounts aswell as build trusted advisor relationships with key customer personas.


Our Outside Sales teams rely on them for both business case development and ISG portfolio advice during the sales process. They directly advise customers on everything from establishing senior relationships in the customer / partners, positioning the solution / product, TCO / PoC initiatives, proposal development (requirements, as-is/to-be, differentiators) through to pricing and negotiation.


Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Product and Solutions Specialist on our Specialty Sales Team. Our Specialty Sales team leads the way in helping organizations modernize their data centers, embrace hybrid and multicloud strategies, and unlock the full potential of AI and data-driven innovation.


Dell empowers customers with a comprehensive portfolio of solutions - from high-performance storage and converged infrastructure to cutting-edge AI platforms and as-a-Service offerings through Dell APEX.


We are at the forefront of enabling AI-powered digital transformation. Our solutions are designed to support the most demanding workload - from traditional enterprise applications to modern AI, ML, and edge deployments. With innovations like PowerStore, PowerScale, PowerFlex, and Dell AI Factory, we help customers build scalable, secure, and intelligent infrastructure that accelerates outcomes.

**What you’ll achieve**  

As a Product and Solutions Specialist, you will proactively identify and solve customer business needs by providing subject matter expertise and creating solutions using Dell’s products and services.  

  

**You will:**  

* Manage relationships with senior level personnel and decision makers in both customers AND partners. Run territory and or accounts, including account planning, sales forecasting, engaging cross-functional resources and working with the virtual teams to ensure alignment across the organizations
* Regularly engage with decision makers at client facilities in performing primary duties
* Provide sales leadership and experience on large, sophisticated opportunities
* Demonstrate the value of a product and/or service technology to advance customer business objectives
* Provide insight and thought leadership to customers concerning applicability of highly complex products and services. Act as a technical resource for the sales organization to help meet and exceed their objectives

  

**Take the first step towards your dream career**  

Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:  

  

**Essential Requirements**  

* Demonstrate high energy, integrity, and excellent relationship building experience with customers & partners
* Good balance between commercial and technical skills relating to AI/Data Management, Private/Public Cloud & Cyber solutions.
* Team player who will spend time with colleagues, customers and partners whether in the office or in the field. Willing to travel anywhere to get the job done and engage different customers and partners. Willing to travel anywhere to get the job done and engage different customers and partners.
* Knowledge of the infrastructure storage market will be particularly key for both traditional and virtualized infrastructure.
* Exceptional oral and written communication skills to communicate with customers, support personnel and leadership. Fluency in Swedish is required.

  

**Desirable Requirements**  

* Consulting led selling / outcome based business case experience in SaaS / CaaS / IaaS
* Experience of various commercial agreements eg OPEX, license agreements, MSAs, etc.
* 5+ years of related experience in a relationship selling role
* Bachelor’s degree

  

**Who we are**
We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you.  

  

Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.  

  

Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.

**Job ID:**R276803
company_description: Dell Technologies is committed to driving human progress.

title: PCB Design Engineer
description:
Flex is the diversified manufacturing partner of choice that helps market-leading brands design, build and deliver innovative products that improve the world.
A career at Flex offers the opportunity to make a difference and invest in your growth in a respectful, inclusive, and collaborative environment. If you are excited about a role but don't meet every bullet point, we encourage you to apply and join us to create the extraordinary.
Job Summary
Flex Power Modules is looking for a passionate and experienced PCB Design Engineer to join our R&D team. In this role you will be at the forefront of developing next-generation power solutions for the Internet & Cloud infrastructure and AI – focusing on advanced DC/DC conversion and power electronics.
This is a unique opportunity for someone with deep technical knowledge in PCB Design for power electronics who wants to work hands-on with cutting-edge technologies and global hyper-scalers.
You will be part of our so-called support team, which takes on assignments from the four design teams that we currently have on site in Kalmar.
You will be introduced to the work by our senior PCB developer and will after that work in our so- called support team which takes on tasks from our four product design teams. We follow a SCRUM similar way of working with planning once a month and follow-ups a couple of times per week.
The PCB development work is an iterative process where the PCB designer works closely together with the team’s simulation engineers who will perform FEM simulations – both electronic and mechanical – on your design
What a typical day looks like:* You will do PCB Design for new power module products.
* PCB Design of testboards.
* Update and evaluation of design rules.


The experience we’re looking to add to our team:* B.Sc or M.Sc in electronics or relevant working experience.
* Experience from PCB- and electronic design.
* Fluent English.


What you’ll receive for the great work you provide:* Knowledge within EMC, signal integrity and/or wave theory.
* A role at the forefront of technology in AI and data center infrastructure.
* A chance to influence product development from concept to launch.
* Knowledge in production technique of PCB.
* Knowledge in standards for PCB production.
* Experience of Cadence Allegro PCB Editor.


EB05
Job Category
Design, Process & Technology Engineering
Required Skills:
Optional Skills:
Flex is an Equal Opportunity Employer and employment selection decisions are based on merit, qualifications, and abilities. We do not discriminate based on: age, race, religion, color, sex, national origin, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, disability, pregnancy status, or any other status protected by law. We're happy to provide reasonable accommodations to those with a disability for assistance in the application process. Please email accessibility@flex.com and we'll discuss your specific situation and next steps (NOTE: this email does not accept or consider resumes or applications. This is only for disability assistance. To be considered for a position at Flex, you must complete the application process first).

title: Strategic Account Executive - US East
description:
Curity is the global leader in **API-driven Security**, perfectly positioned to capture a significant part of the growing **AI Security market**. Our customers are already looking to us to help them drive AI Agent<>human and AI Agent<>AI Agent security use cases with our cloud-native API-driven security platform.



Today, we help organizations secure millions of users, AI-agents, and connected 'things' across web and mobile applications for major global brands. We are a serious player in key data-sensitive sectors like Banking & Finance, Insurance, and Retail. We are looking for an ambitious and self-driven **Strategic Account Lead** to build and drive our growth in US North-East.


**About the Role**
------------------



This is a unique opportunity to be 'first on the ground' within your territory with a strong and relevant product offering for large enterprises. Curity has made headway in the US and there is already a customer footprint to build on. We are investing in the right profile who will kick it up a notch. A self-starter, entrepreneurial mindset and early-stage tech experience is key; and the right candidate will be able to position Curity in major US financial services and other ideal-customer profiles. In this role, you will be able to **find, develop and close business** in large accounts (+1bn$ turnover), while providing high visibility and becoming a champion of the Curity brand.


**What You’ll Be Doing**


* **Develop, drive and execute** against a field/ regional sales and GTM plan in collaboration with Curity leadership.
* **Prospect, network, and build relationships** into a strong and qualified pipeline of business in Curity ICP accounts.
* **Develop and guide sales efforts** and processes with prospective customers and partners.
* **Negotiate, curate and complete sales transactions and licensing deals** with prospective customers and partners, against annual and/or quarterly quota targets.
* **Collaborate across teams** – Work closely with sales development representatives, pre-sales engineers, and marketing to refine the field/ regional plan and strategy.
* **Maintain accurate sales pipeline and forecasting** – keep CRM updated and provide accurate sales projections on a weekly, monthly and quarterly basis.
* **Market insights and trends** – bring feedback to the marketing and product marketing teams based on customer interactions.
* **Travel as needed** – attend industry events, meet clients, and represent Curity in the market (expected up-to 50%).

**Who You Are**
---------------



An **entrepreneurial self-starter** with **start-up and/ or scale-up experience**. You should bring:


* **5+ years of proven sales experience** in prospecting and closing deals. Background in BDR/SDR roles transitioning into AE/Sales positions is a strong plus.
* **Experience selling technical solutions** (API management, identity security, cybersecurity or data infra) to enterprise customers is a big plus.
* Ability to **self-source leads and drive sales** independently.
* Experience in **selling to C-level executives and technical decision-makers**.
* Track record of **executing against, and accelerating beyond a regional field sales quota**.
* Strong **organizational and collaboration skills**, a self-motivated attitude, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced remote environment.

**Why Join Curity?**
--------------------


* **Global Leader in API Security** – positioned to capture the **AI Security market**.
* **We are a cutting-edge** platform already trusted by top enterprises.
* **Be part of the Agentic AI Security wave**. Work with a team at the forefront of helping large businesses roll out AI into critical environments.
* **High-Impact Role** – Be a key player in shaping Curity’s success in the US market.
* **Autonomy & Flexibility** – Enjoy the freedom to manage your sales pipeline, work remotely, and operate as CEO in your territory.
* **Collaborative Culture** – Join a talented international team that values innovation and teamwork


**Ready to Take the Lead?** If you’re excited about this opportunity, we’d love to hear from you! Apply today!


Full time
Remote - US East


#### **Contact us**


+46 8-410 737 70

title: Marketing Coordinator (12 months fixed term contract) Asset Management Malmo
description:
*We offer an opportunity you simply won’t find anywhere else. In less than six years, Mileway has grown into Europe’s leader in last mile logistics real estate, with a 550-plus team across twenty six offices in eleven countries.*  

*Maternity cover (minimum 1 year)*  



Are you a proactive and detail-oriented professional eager to contribute to a fast-growing, dynamic team? Mileway is seeking a Marketing Coordinator to support our Asset Management team and drive high-quality property marketing and leasing activities. You will report to the Regional Marketing Manager and work closely with colleagues across Sweden and Europe.  



You will have the opportunity to shape and grow the role, becoming a key player in coordinating marketing campaigns, managing property listings, and supporting leasing efforts.  


**Working at Mileway**

We offer an opportunity you simply won’t find anywhere else. Launched in 2019, Mileway has rapidly grown into Europe’s leader in last-mile logistics real estate, with a team of over 550 across more than twenty offices in 11 countries. From the start, Mileway set out to be a different kind of real estate company, with a cloud-based IT infrastructure and a team that combines local expertise with the pooled strengths of a pan-European presence.  



Our culture is fast-paced and highly international, with team members from more than 50 countries, bringing diverse perspectives and a “can-do” attitude to everything we do. While we have already achieved a lot, we’re only just getting started – our purpose is to be Europe’s leading provider of last mile logistics real estate, enabling businesses to thrive, driving sustainability forward, and shaping the cities of tomorrow. To get there, we live by our values: Drive, Trust, Grow, Together.  



At Mileway, we believe company growth comes from supporting the growth of our combined capabilities. That’s why we offer an in-house learning & development program where personal, professional, and business development go hand in hand, helping you carve out your own unique career path. You’ll be based at our Malmo office. While we embrace a flexible approach to work, our policy requires working from the office three days a week. To support this, we provide a state-of-the-art technology package to keep you connected at all times.  


**What you’ll do**
* Ensure high-quality standards across all property marketing activities for vacant premises – manage listings, marketing materials, portals, and ad renewals in line with brand guidelines.
* Coordinate marketing campaigns – develop landing pages, track performance, and support lead follow-up.
* Create leasing materials – brochures, newsletters, banners, and other collateral to support leasing.
* Support Asset Managers with tailored presentations and prospect materials.
* Manage external vendors – photographers and suppliers to ensure premium content.
* Oversee CMS for marketing assets and coordinate signage updates.
* Create LinkedIn content for property promotions and support Salesforce CRM activities.
* Manage translations, proofreading, and content creation.
* Collaborate closely with the Nordics Marketing Manager on both planned and ad-hoc projects across the Nordics.

  


**What you bring**
* Experience in sales/leasing support and marketing coordination.
* A proactive and organized mindset with excellent multitasking abilities.
* Strong communication skills in Swedish and English, both written and spoken.
* Proficiency in MS Office (Outlook, Excel, Word, PowerPoint), familiarity with Salesforce or other CRM system, and experience in Adobe CC is a plus.
* Ability to work effectively in an international environment and collaborate across teams.
* A keen eye for detail and a drive to maintain high-quality standards.
* Positive, solution-oriented attitude and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic setting.

  


*Our vision is to be the number one gateway to urban communities. To get there, we live our values: Drive, Trust, Grow, Together.*

title: Project Manager
description:
**G+D makes the lives of billions of people around the world more secure. We shape trust in the digital age with built-in security tech in three segments: Digital Security, Financial Platforms and Currency Technology. We have been a reliable partner for our customers for over 170 years with our innovative solutions for SecurityTech! We are an international technology group and traditional family business with over 14,000 employees in 40 countries. Creating Confidence is our path to success. Trust is the basis of our collaboration within G+D.**

**We are the reliable partner for all challenges resulting from the Internet of Things. We offer a complete connectivity portfolio for mobile network operators, automotive manufacturers, technology companies such as chip and module manufacturers as well as transport and logistics providers. Our portfolio includes highly secure solutions in the area of connectivity & IoT, from classic SIM, eSIM and iSIM, to the associated embedded operating systems and life cycle management, through to services for global connectivity and IoT solutions. Do you want to actively shape the digital transformation with us?**

Give yourself an outstanding opportunity to develop and form career in a dynamic and international environment. We are now looking for a **Project Manager** to join us at G+D Mobile Security for a permanent position based in Stockholm.


**Key Responsibilities**
------------------------


As Project Manager in our Digital Operations unit, you play a central role throughout the entire project lifecycle.You’re involved early in the process, supporting pre-sales by assessing timelines, resources, and costs. Once a deal is closed, you lead the project from start to finish, working closely with engineers and ensuring delivery aligns with our global processes and quality standards.Your responsibility is to keep the project stable and on track, making sure all solution scopes are delivered. Internally, you collaborate with Sales and Operations teams. Externally, you are the key point of contact for our customers. You plan and allocate resources, estimate effort, and ensure the right people are involved at the right time to deliver the project successfully to the customer.* You are responsible for planning and steering of customer projects with various complexities in our division Mobile Security
* The typical project scope is e.g. customer onboarding on our standard or customized eSIM/connectivity solutions, targeting Telecom Industry, Automotive or OEMs
* You manage the project effectively within the given budget and time restrictions
* You evaluate and manage the risks and take mitigation measures in order to avoid or minimize risks
* You support pre-sales activities which includes effort estimation and cost assessment based on defined scope
* You are requested to suggest and contribute to process, method and tool improvement




**Qualifications**
------------------


We’re looking for a senior Project Manager who takes ownership, communicates clearly, and navigates complex stakeholder landscapes with confidence. You’re open-minded, respectful, and curious, always seeking to understand different perspectives before acting. With experience in intercultural environments, you thrive in diverse teams and handle global collaboration with ease. You work independently, take full responsibility for your projects, and leave a strong professional impression through your structured and proactive approach.Moreover, you need to have:* University degree in engineering, business, project management or related field
* Proven experience running complex projects in the IT, Technology or Security industry
* Strong commercial experience with good understanding of project management tools and techniques
* Preferably experience in customer interaction
* Advanced knowledge in Swedish and English


It is extra good if you have:

* Experience managing projects covering different deployment scenarios such as hosted, Cloud and customer premises
* Preferably ITIL v3 foundation- and PMP / PRINCE 2 certification


Do you want to contribute to build the future for a seamless and connected society? Then apply today!


**What can we offer you?**
--------------------------


In this role you will have the opportunity to work with talented people in an international and innovative environment. G+D is a well-established family-owned company at the forefront of the market. Besides a dynamic and evolving industry, we offer:
* An annual wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK to support your health and wellbeing
* Three extra days off per year, in addition to your vacation
* A dedicated weekly hour for sports or physical activity
* A strong collective agreement ensuring fair and secure working conditions
* Access to the Benify portal, offering health-related services and exclusive discounts
* Health insurance through Skandia
* A vacation exchange program for added flexibility
* A hybrid work model, allowing you to work up to 50% remotely
* Weekly breakfast at the office to start your day right


Get to know us and our team at G+D Sweden better by listening to our Jobcast below:Shaping the next chapter of the digital ageSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/71GyhbDv090LgVyukyLf7v?si=f399b1f0d93e47e3  

Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e072f95211700118d82a4Our DNA is in our peopleSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6BpWiUCMXr3q68dSGEr2w7?si=e4328a3c8db34b8d  

Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e070580b8d100110f0e95

title: Application Support Engineer – ERP Systems
description:
**As an ERP Application Engineer, you will be responsible for supporting, maintaining, and developing key applications that drive the efficiency of ESS operations. You will work closely with your team of two more experts in the field, and with stakeholders in procurement, finance, and HR to ensure seamless use of systems such as Unit4 ERP, Primavera P6 EPPM, Mercur Business Control, and CatalystOne HRM. You will also actively contribute to ongoing projects, including the implementation of the CatalystOne HRM suite, new payroll solutions, and Workforce Management tools and ERP Cloud migration.**


### **Assignment Description**


* Provide technical administration, configuration, and support for the Unit4 ERP system, Primavera P6 EPPM, Mercur Business Control and CatalystOne HRM platform.
* Participate in the implementation of new HRM and Workforce Management tools, ensuring successful integration into existing ESS systems.
* Manage system integrations and interfaces between ERP tools and other ESS systems.
* Collaborate with stakeholders in procurement, finance, and HR to identify and implement system improvements.
* Diagnose and resolve application issues, ensuring operational continuity.
* Support the development and implementation of workflows, payroll solutions, reporting processes, and process automation.
* Liaise with external vendors and service providers


**Required Skills**


* **Education:** Degree in computer science, information systems, or a related field.
* **Experience:** Proven experience working with ERP systems, preferably Unit4 ERP, Primavera, CatalystOne, and/or Mercur.
* Familiarity with HR/payroll and workforce management systems is an advantage.


**Technical Skills:**


* Experience with system configuration, troubleshooting, and workflows.
* Understanding of ERP and HRM system integrations with procurement, finance, or HR processes.
* Knowledge of database management, data migration, and reporting tools is an advantage.

title: Receptionist Scandic Frimurarehotellet
description:
Endast 150 meter från Linköpings centralstation ligger Scandic Frimurarehotellet – hotellet där tradition och framtid möts. Beläget strax intill Domkyrkan i en av Linköpings vackraste byggnader ligger vårt moderna och avslappnade hotell med anor från 1912. Hotellet är Östergötlands största och arrangerar allt från möten och bröllop till stora banketter. Vi som jobbar här är närmare hundra medarbetare och vi har vårt ursprung från ungefär hela världen, precis som våra gäster. Att vi är ett stort hotell och att de tre Scandic hotellen i Linköping har gemensam ledning medför mycket goda utvecklingsmöjligheter för våra medarbetare.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Frimurarehotellet.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (dagar, kvällar, nätter och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

Enable "functional cookies" to watch the video


...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Teknisk Projektledning
description:
**Om uppdraget:**


Vår kund ska implementera en flygplatsdriftsplan (AOP) för Arlanda flygplats. Syftet med AOP:n är att skapa en gemensam situationsbild för flygplatsens olika intressenter, öka förutsägbarheten och effektiviteten i verksamheten, samt fungera som ett verktyg för att minimera effekterna av störningar.


Som en del av detta arbete kommer vår kund att upphandla en SaaS-lösning som kommer att användas av flygplatsens operativa intressenter – såsom flygplatsoperatören, marktjänstföretaget, flygbolaget, flygtrafiktjänstleverantören, gränspolisen, tull etc.


Den upphandlade lösningen kommer att integreras med flera olika datakällor och system via kundens integrationsplattform med hjälp av API:er. Prognosmodeller för kapacitets- och efterfrågeinformation kommer att utvecklas av kunden, medan dataaggregering och beräkning av KPI:er kommer att hanteras i kundens BI-plattform.

**Rollbeskrivning:**


Vi söker en erfaren teknisk projektledare som ansvarar för implementeringen av **AOP-lösningen** i sin helhet – både införandet av den upphandlade lösningen och utvecklingen av de komponenter som ligger på kundens sida.


Rollen innebär ett nära samarbete med projektets huvudprojektledare och omfattar ansvar för den tekniska delen av leveransen. Du kommer att arbeta i en komplex miljö med många intressenter och bidra till att säkerställa kvalitet, stabila leveranser och effektiva integrationslösningar.


För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är driven, noggrann, lyhörd och kommunikativ, med en naturlig förmåga att skapa förtroende och samverka över organisationsgränser.

**Skallkrav:**

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av teknisk projektledning av komplexa IT-projekt, inklusive multi-cloud-miljöer (t.ex. Azure, Google Cloud eller AWS).
* Du ska ha drivit tekniska projekt med dokumenterat goda resultat och fokus på leverans, kvalitet och samarbete.
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling.
* Stor kunskap om, och erfarenhet av, agil arbetsmetodik, inklusive planering och ledning av sprintar.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta tätt med projektledare, IT-arkitekter, utvecklare och externa leverantörer.
* Mycket god samarbets- och ledarskapsförmåga, med starka färdigheter i kommunikation och problemlösning i komplexa miljöer.
* Stor teknisk förståelse inom systemutveckling, systemintegration, BI och molnlösningar.
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning eller likvärdig arbetslivserfarenhet

**Meriterande :**

* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera federerad autentisering och Azure Entra ID.

**Erfarenhet:**

**Kunskap** : Hög kompetens inom området.

**Erfarenhet** : God kunskap och erfarenhet inom åberopat område, vanligtvis som konsult.

**Ledning** : Kan ta ansvar för kompetensområdet och leda en mindre grupp.

**Självständighet** :Kan arbeta självständigt.

**Startdatum:** 2026-01-14 **Längd:** 2027-12-31

**Möjlighet till distansarbete/Flextid:** Ja, när arbetet tillåter. Kontoret ligger på Arlanda flygplats.

**Arbetstid: 100% -40 /h**

**Möjlighet till förlängning:** Ja

**Information gällande säkerhetsprövning:**  

Varje kund ställer höga krav på konsultens säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll och undertecknande av säkerhetsskyddsavtal enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan genomföras av konsulten och konsultens arbetsgivare innan uppdragsavtalet kan verkställas.  

  

**Intervju:**  

Konsult/Leverantör kan bli kallad till intervju för att fastställa kvalifikationskrav vid behov.  

  

**Sista ansökningsdag:**  

Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-11-06. Vi erbjuder dock ofta löpande erbjudanden. Det innebär att vi ibland tar bort uppdraget från vår webbplats tidigare än sista ansökningsdag. Om du är intresserad av ett uppdrag rekommenderar vi att du ansöker omgående.  

  

**Nödvändiga färdigheter:**  

Google Cloud, Driva tekniska projekt, Azure, Entra ID/Azure AD, Erfarenhet av att driva komplexa IT-projekt, Systemintegration  

Minst 5 års erfarenhet av teknisk projektledning, BAKGRUND INOM SYSTEMUTVECKLING, Agila, agila arbetsmetoder  

  

**Språk**  

Engelska, Svenska

title: S/4 HANA Sales Solutions Consultant
description:
**Shape the Future as an S/4 HANA Sales Solutions Consultant**


Do you love helping businesses succeed through technology? If combining **business consulting expertise** with **SAP innovation** excites you, this is your chance to make an impact.


At **Accenture**, you’ll join a team that blends **technology and human ingenuity** to transform organizations worldwide. This role offers **career growth**, **global exposure**, and the opportunity to work on projects that truly matter.

**Why You’ll Love This Role**

* Drive **SAP S/4 HANA Sales transformations** for leading companies.
* Work on **large-scale, global projects** with top-tier clients.

* Grow your **consulting, technical, and business skills** in a dynamic environment.
* Enjoy **competitive benefits** and a culture built on collaboration and innovation.
* Contribute to **sustainability goals** through SAP solutions.

**About Our SAP Customer & Channels Nordic Practice**


For over **40 years**, Accenture has partnered with SAP to lead transformation programs across the Nordics. **SAP Customer & Channels** specialize in **SAP S/4 HANA Cloud**, **Ariba**, **SuccessFactors**, **SAP BTP**, and **SAP RISE**, helping businesses stay ahead in a fast-changing world.


  

**What We’re Looking For**

* Strong understanding of **Quote-to-Cash** processes.

* Familiarity with **Fiori**, **BRF+**, **RISE**, **SAP BTP**.
* Analytical mindset, adaptability, and passion for innovation.
* Preferably fluent in one of the Nordic Languages

**Ready to take the next step?** Join us and help shape the future of business with SAP.

title: Backend Architect_Lead
description:
**Assignment description**

  

Professional Galaxy is looking for a Backend Architect / Lead who can take lead in setting up the architecture of our backend systems and services.


The person needs to have a good experience in working with backend systems and orchestration services, preferably in an e-commerce company.


The person needs to have a good understanding of architectural principles and architectural patterns.

  

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Architect and design scalable, secure, and high-performance backend systems.
* Lead the rebuilding and modernization of systems into modern, cloud-native architectures.
* Define and enforce best practices in backend development,
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align backend architecture with product and business goals.
* Evaluate and select appropriate technologies, frameworks, and tools.
* Drive API design and integration strategies (REST, GraphQL, gRPC, etc.).
* Ensure systems are resilient, fault-tolerant, and meet SLAs.
* Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies.

  

**Duration:** 2025.11.18 - 2026.11.30  

**Submission Deadline:** 2025.11.07**Please apply directly through the career page link:**

* Your updated CV
* Availability to start


- In the motivation, describe why you are suitable for this assignment - refer to previous consulting assignments, employment, education & personal qualities.


**Offer continuously:**

Please note that for this role we offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested, we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Receptionist, heltid
description:
Vi söker en nu en ny stjärna till vårt fantastiska team i receptionen. Din roll som receptionist är enormt viktig och vi ser gärna du är en dedikerad person med en naturlig fallenhet för service, bemötande och att skapa minnesvärda upplevelser för våra gäster.

  

The Sparrow Hotel, Stockholms färgstarka och chica boutiquehotell med varm, avslappnad och personlig service. Hotellet består av 87 rum och sviter, mitt i stan två minuter från Stureplan, nära allt och alla. Hotellets hjärta är vår franska vinbar och bistro skapad av Mathias Dahlgren.
  

The Sparrow Hotel drivs av Grand Group, där även Grand Hôtel Stockholm och Lydmar Hotel ingår.

**Vem är det vi söker?**

* Din roll som receptionist är placerad på The Sparrow Hotel men som receptionist sköter du även kommunikation och bokningar med gäster via olika kanaler.
* Du ska ha service ut i fingertopparna och ha erfarenhet av gästbemötande, helst i hotellmiljö.
* Du har en positiv attityd, ser möjligheter i det mesta, är engagerad och vill vara delaktig i vår strävan att varje dag bli ännu lite bättre och skapa minnesvärda stunder för våra gäster.
* Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska obehindrat. Ytterligare språk är starkt meriterande
* Du är flexibel och ser inga hinder för att arbeta dag/kväll under vardagar och helg.
* Du skall vara bekväm i att arbeta själv delar av tiden och andra tider i fullt tempo med andra kollegor.

**Dina egenskaper**


Du uppskattar en härlig energi på din arbetsplats där du är med och sprider den. Du vet vad personlig service i världsklass innebär och du brinner för att skapa en varm, professionell och minnesvärd känsla hos våra gäster som dröjer sig kvar. Du är inte rädd för att hugga i där det behövs och du trivs med att arbeta självständigt. Här jobbar vi i ett litet team där vi hela tider hjälper varandra och där teamwork är dreamwork.


Det absolut viktigaste för oss är att du är rätt person som besitter rätt inställning. Du är ansvarstagande, snabbtänkt, självgående och lösningsorienterad samt har en känsla för små och stora detaljer. Att du älskar att ge service och kvalitet och har ett personligt värdskap ser vi som en självklarhet. Om du dessutom är en charmig och sympatisk person med en känsla för vad våra gäster vill ha innan de ens vet det själva: då är det här jobbet för dig!

**Vad erbjuder vi?**


En ansvarsfull tjänst som Receptionist på ett av Stockholm mest personliga och inbjudande boutique-hotell.


Vi önskar att just du har:

* Erfarenhet av Opera Cloud.
* Erfarenhet från hotellbranschen.
* Har vanan och erfarenheten från receptionsarbete.


Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning om 100%. Arbetstiden är efter rullande schema/skift och vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.


Tillträde snarast och lön enligt överenskommelse, vi tillämpar kollektivavtal.


Vill du veta mer eller söka direkt till så kontakta Rooms Division Manager, Albin Ydmark Buhre på albin.buhre@thesparrow.se


Som en del av rekryteringsprocessen utför vi bakgrundskontroller.


Varmt välkommen till oss på the Sparrow Hotel där vi tillsammans skapar Sparrow moments!
